CustomField.formula: IF ( Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c > 0, TEXT(FLOOR( Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c)) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( 24 * ( Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c - FLOOR(Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c) ))) & " hours" & TEXT( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c - FLOOR(Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c - FLOOR(Time_for_Blue_Tarp_s_Response__c) ),8)) ),0)) & " mn " , "")
CustomField.label: Blue Tarp's Response Time
